title: BotState
description: Current state of a bot without an id. The id must be hidden for enemy bots

radarSweep.description: Radar sweep angle in degrees, i.e. angle between previous and current radar direction

speed.description: Speed measured in units per turn

turnRate.description: Turn rate of the body in degrees per turn (can be positive and negative)

gunTurnRate.description: Turn rate of the gun in degrees per turn (can be positive and negative)

radarTurnRate.description: Turn rate of the radar in degrees per turn (can be positive and negative)

bodyColor.description: Current RGB color of the body

turretColor.description: New color of the gun turret

bulletColor.description: New color of the bullet. Note. This will be the color of a bullet when it is fired

scanColor.description: New color of the scan arc
